Directions: In a skillet, cook beef, green pepper and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. In a slow cooker, combine the remaining ingredients. Stir in beef mixture. Cover and cook on high for 4-5 hours or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 (1 pound) package smoked sausage, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced
1 (16 ounce) can pork and beans, undrained
1 (15 ounce) can lima beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
